title: Sci-fi movie box office soars in China in 2019: report
content:
BEIJING, Nov. 1 (Xinhua) -- The box office of homemade sci-fi movies in 2019 reached 7.14 billion yuan (about 1.06 billion U.S. dollars) in China, more than twice the number in 2018, said a report issued on Sunday.
According to the report of China's sci-fi industry, made public at the China Science Fiction Convention 2020 held in Beijing, sci-fi movies' total box office last year in the Chinese market was more than 19.5 billion yuan.
Chinese blockbusters including "The Wandering Earth" led the homemade sci-fi film box office.
Along with the rising attention paid to sci-fi movies, their related products also saw a larger market, the report said, noting that there were over 1,000 kinds of sci-fi related merchandise last year with an overall market value of 1.35 billion yuan. Enditem
